backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor with storage mixins, access control, cruise deals, itineraries, bookings, reviews, alerts, branding settings, and other state maps.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration function that adds a backendVersion field to the actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one-line summaries for numerous frontend components and files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark mode using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app logic that detects share links and renders either the shared itinerary page or the full homepage layout with dialogs and alerts.
Displays toast notifications for new unviewed admin alerts when the caller is an admin.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboardDi: Admin dashboard dialog showing alerts, bookings, logos, and branding tabs with automatic alert viewing updates.
frontend/src/components/AdminSettingsDia: Admin settings dialog showing user role, principal ID, backend status, and allowing admin role assignment.
frontend/src/components/AppStatusLiveLin: Displays the appâ€™s live URL with copy/open actions and shows backend diagnostics like version and timestamp.
frontend/src/components/BookingModal.tsx: Modal for selecting cabins and submitting a booking for a cruise itinerary, including cost calculation.
frontend/src/components/CruiseCard.tsx: Displays cruise deal details with destination imagery, favorite toggling, and itinerary viewing.
frontend/src/components/CruiseLineLogosM: Admin interface to add, edit, preview, and delete cruise line logos with image upload support.
frontend/src/components/CruiseLinePartne: Shows a grid of cruise line partner logos or skeletons while loading.
Displays a dialog listing the user's favorite cruise deals with loading states and empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedDeals.ts: Fetches and shows featured cruise deals in a carousel with auto-scroll, loading skeletons, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and copyright info.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the main site header with navigation, authentication controls, admin actions, and dialogs for favorites and bookings.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Shows the homepage hero banner with background image, promotional text, action buttons, and quick stats.
Displays detailed cruise itinerary information with tabs, reviews, booking, sharing, and PDF export options.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts new authenticated users to enter their name and saves their profile information.
frontend/src/components/ReviewSection.ts: Renders and manages cruise reviews, including creating, editing, deleting, and displaying user reviews with star ratings.
frontend/src/components/SearchSection.ts: Provides cruise search and filtering UI, including query input, filter controls, and displaying matched cruise results.
frontend/src/components/SharedItineraryP: Displays a shareable itinerary page with branding, images, and details, handling loading, errors, and expired links.
frontend/src/components/SharedPageBrandi: Offers a settings form for updating shared page branding fields and saving or resetting branding configurations.
frontend/src/components/UserBookingsDial: Shows a dialog listing the user's bookings with status, itinerary details, and loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login flow, stored identity loading, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating cruise, itinerary, and user data via an actor, integrating identity and caching behaviors.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind CSS layers and defines extensive color variables and utility classes for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/colorValidation.ts: Validates color strings and provides helpers for applying safe CSS color styles with fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/itineraryPdf.ts: Generates a printable HTML-based PDF page for an itinerary by opening a styled print window.
frontend/src/utils/sharedItineraryBrandi: Merges branding settings with default values for shared itinerary pages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hash-based routing support and session storage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended color palettes, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, known issues, and implemented features related to live app links and deployment diagnostics for the 'Next Time Vacations' project.
